🚀 Auto Refresh Plus: Refresh Pages Automatically with Ease!
Do you spend too much time hitting that refresh button? Let Auto Refresh Plus take over and simplify your browsing experience! 🌟 Designed to automatically refresh tabs at custom intervals, this extension is the ultimate tool to save time and stay updated.

Whether you're monitoring live stats, tracking deals, or testing websites, Auto Refresh Plus keeps your tabs refreshed effortlessly. 🙌

🔥 Key Features of Auto Refresh Plus
✨ Custom Refresh Intervals: Set your preferred auto refresh rate in seconds, minutes, or hours. Choose from quick presets like 5 seconds, 10 seconds, 15 seconds, or go custom with your own settings.

✨ Tab-Specific Refreshing: Control exactly which tab needs to be auto-refreshed without affecting other tabs.

✨ Countdown Timer on Icon: Keep track of the next refresh directly on the extension icon! For seconds, it displays a live countdown, and for minutes or hours, it shows an elegant "HH:MM:SS" format.

✨ Advanced Refresh Controls:

Limit the number of auto-refresh cycles to suit your needs.
Set infinite refreshes to keep your tabs updated as long as you need!
Refresh your tabs in the background without interruptions—even after closing the popup.
✨ User-Friendly Interface: A sleek, clean design ensures beginners can set up their auto-refresh needs in seconds.

💡 Why Choose Auto Refresh Plus?
✅ Perfect for Multitasking: Stop wasting time manually reloading pages. Let Auto Refresh Plus do the hard work for you.

✅ Stay Updated Instantly: Ideal for live data tracking, auction bidding, stock prices, sports scores, and product restocks.

✅ Developer & Tester Favorite: Simplify debugging and website testing with automated refresh functionality.

✅ Works in the Background: Once started, your tab will keep auto-refreshing without keeping the popup open.

✅ Safe and Secure: Auto Refresh Plus doesn’t collect or store any personal data. Your browsing privacy is always our priority. 🔒

🌍 Who Will Love Auto Refresh Plus?
Shoppers: Never miss a product restock or flash sale!
Developers: Automate repetitive page reloads for efficient debugging.
Traders: Track live stock prices or cryptocurrency updates effortlessly.
Bloggers & Writers: Keep an eye on news sites or blog updates without lifting a finger.
Everyone: Whether it’s work or play, Auto Refresh Plus is for anyone who wants smarter tab management.
✨ How It Works
1️⃣ Choose a preset time (5 seconds, 10 seconds, 15 seconds, 5 minutes, or 10 minutes) or create a custom interval.
2️⃣ Set the number of refreshes or let it run infinitely.
3️⃣ Click "Start," and Auto Refresh Plus begins auto-refreshing your selected tab.
4️⃣ Monitor the live countdown on the extension icon to see when your tab will refresh again.

🔒 Privacy First
Your security is our top priority! Auto Refresh Plus does not track, collect, or share your data. It’s designed to refresh tabs, nothing more.

📈 Boost Productivity with Auto Refresh Plus Today!
Ready to save time and maximize your productivity? Install Auto Refresh Plus now and enjoy the benefits of automated page refreshing. Whether you're managing one tab or many, this extension ensures you're always up to date—hands-free!
